resources.string: Only numbers and letters from A-Z

By blocking this user, the user will not be able to see any of your moments and you will not be able see any of his. This will take effect next time you refresh the feed. Are you sure you want to block this user?
Are you sure you want to delete the moment?
Are you sure you want to delete all the moments?
By reporting this user, you are saying that this user violates the terms of service. Are you sure you want to report this user?
By reporting this moment, you are saying that this moment does not comply with the community guidelines. Are you sure you want to report this moment?
